name: 林顯易
objective: 本課程將包含數位訊號處理基本原理介紹及相關實驗課。本課程將介紹基本數位訊號取樣觀念及數位線性系統，連續時間及分散時間傅利葉轉換，無限及有限脈衝響應濾波器設計。
schedule:
Weeks 　　Topics
1　　Introduction, basic concepts of DSP
2　　Discrete-time linear systems 
3　　Discrete-time linear systems 
4　　Z-transform
5　　Z-transform
6　　Discrete-time Fourier transform (DTFT)
7　　Discrete-time Fourier transform (DTFT)
8　　Frequency selective linear filtering and sample theorem
9　　Sampling and Reconstruction Signals
10　　Mid-Term Exam
11　　Discrete Fourier transform (DFT)
12　　Discrete Fourier transform (DFT)
13　　Fast Fourier Transform (FFT)
14　　Implementation Discrete-Time Systems
15　　FIR filter design
16　　IIR filter design
17　　Introduction of TI C28xx DSPs and their developmental tools
18　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中報告50%
期末報告50%
materials: J. G. Proakis and D. G. Manolakis, Digital Signal Processing: Principles, Algorithms, and Applications, Prentice-Hall, NJ, Fourth Edition, 2007.
